title: FIFA 18 ICON EDITION v1.03 [Update 2]
description:
Release date: 2017
Genre: Sport, Soccer, 3D
Developer: EA Canada
Publisher: Electronic Arts
Publication Type: RePack
Language: RUS | ENG
Language of voice: RUS | ENG
Crack: Included (STEAMPUNKS)

FIFA 18 based on Frostbite blurs the boundaries between the virtual and the real world, thoroughly recreating the players, teams and atmosphere of real football. Evaluate the movements of players for which the Real Player Motion technology is responsible - a new animation system that opens the next level of realism in the management and personality of players and allows creating great moments in the atmosphere of this football. Then go on a world tour in the role of Alex Hunter, along with Cristiano Ronaldo and other European football stars.


RePack features : 

Based on FIFA 18 ICON Edition
Game archives are not opened
Game version 1.03 UPDATE 2
Included updated compounds, as of 07.10.2017. To activate them in the game, go to Personalization> Profile> Download Compositions
save the profile. If you want to start a career with updated compositions, make sure that you have the option "Your current lineup"
The interface language and subtitles are selected to start the game; language of comments - in the settings inside the game
A shortcut to the settings of the game on the desktop

How to install : 

Mount or burn
Install
Play
